pages.text: 67|13|Arau tomaloke tomalokara katha gopane koraa athaba prakasyabharae koraa, niscaya te'om antarasamuhata yi ache se'i bisaye samyaka aragata.
67|14|Yijane srsti karaiche, teraemi najanibane? Athaca te'om suksmadarsi, samyaka arahita.

67|15|Teraemi tomalokara babe prthiraikhanaka sugama karai diche, eteke tomaloke iyara patha-praantarata bicarana karaa arau te'omra jiraikara paraa tomaloke ahara karaa; arau te'omra ocarate'i punaraut'thana.
67|16|Tomaloke te'omra paraa nirbhaya haicha neki ye, yijana akasata ache te'om tomalokaka prthiraisaha (puti pela'i) dhbansa karaiba arau hathat i (prthiraikhana) thara tharakai kampibalai dharaiba

67|17|athaba tomaloke iyara paraa nirbhaya haicha neki ye, yijana akasata ache, te'om tomalokara oparata sila barsanakarai prabala dhumuha pathaba? Tetiya tomaloke janibalai paba kenekuraa achila mora satarkabani
67|18|arau niscaya sihamtara purbarartisakale'o mithyaraopa karaichila. Phalata kenekuraa achila mora pratyakhyana (iyara sasti)

67|19|sihamte sihamtara oparata (urai phuraa) caraa'iborara prati laksya karaa na'ine, yiborae pakhi meli diye arau sankucita karae? Parama karaunamaya allahe'i e'iboraka sthira karai raakhe. Niscaya te'om sakalo bastura samyaka drasta.
67|20|Parama karaunamaya allahara bahirae tomalokara ene kono sain'yabahini achene, yisakale tomalokaka sahaya karaiba? Kaphirasakala ache mathona prabancanara majata.
67|21|Kona ache enekuraa, yijane tomalokaka jiraika dana karaiba yadi te'om te'omra jiraika bandha karai diye? Baram sihamta abadhyata arau bimukhatata abicala hai ache.
67|22|Yi byakti nata hai mukhara oparata bhara di khoja karhe, siye'i adhika hidayata praapta, ne se'i byakti, yijane pona hai sarala pathata khoja karhe
67|23|koraa, teraemi tomalokaka srsti karaiche arau tomalokara babe srarana arau drstisakti lagate antahkaranasamuha pradana karaiche. Tomaloke khube'i kama krtajnata prakasa karaa.
67|24|Koraa, teraemi tomalokaka prthiraita srsti karai prasaraita karaiche arau te'omra ocarate'i tomalokaka samabeta karaa ha'ba.
67|25|Arau sihamte kaya, 'tomaloke yadi satyabadi horaa tente koraacona e'i pratisrauti ketiya bastabayita haâ€™ba'?.
67|26|Koraa, e'i bisayara jnana kerala allahara ocarate'i ache. Arau ma'ito kerala spasta satarkakarai matra.
